dataset: Markham 2018 Budget Allocation of Revenue and Expenditure by Fund (EXPENDITURES)
note_total_mismatch: Line-item sum across funds = 456,172 k$; file TOTAL shows 456,171 k$. Unity uses line-item sum.

measured_error.note: For nonnegative mass budgets with exclusion+renorm, TV equals discarded mass (audit).
